# `UpdateDecisionTableVersionRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| rowIndexUpdate | [`UpdateRowIndexRequest`](updaterowindexrequest-definition.md) | Yes | An update to a decision table version row index, which moves the row to a new position in the table. Execution output is returned based on the first matching row. |
